modName: DSpSoB compatability for Craftable Stockings by gotha83
summary: Modified version of gotha83\'s .esp file and stocking meshes to support DSpSoB, as the sheath and stockings were using the same slot.
descriptionHtml:
I have created a modified version of gotha83\'s .esp file and stocking meshes to support DSpSoB, as the sheath and stockings were using the same slot. This would cause the stockings to unequip every time I went to dual wield weapons. Annoying!
Changed the stocking body slots to 60.

For use with gotha83\'s mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16837]Craftable Panties Bras and Stockings for CBBEv3M[/url].

I used xp32\'s modified skeleton in my pictures for the lower sheaths.
author: Gigora
